terms.full_expansion: </s>The medical / scientific terms for ginger are: "Zingiber officinale," "Ginger" and "Rosmarinus officinalis." </s>
</s>The medical / scientific terms for stronger bones are: bone strength, bone mass, and bone quality. </s>
</s>The medical / scientific terms for vitamin d are: "vitamin D," "25-hydroxyvitamin D" (25 (OH) D), and "cholecalciferol." </s>
</s>The medical / scientific terms for gut health are often used interchangeably. </s>
</s>The medical / scientific terms for inflammation are often used interchangeably, and this may lead to confusion and misunderstanding. </s>
